Expanding the Marketing Scale Is the Developing Orientation

Hongxing producing impact crusher experts give an advice of “more crushing and less grinding”, that is to say, rationally processing the feeding size, increasing the handling capacity in the crushing link and reducing the grinding effect for the mineral at the greatest extent.With the rapid development of science and technology, we find that the large scale crusher not only can improve the production efficiency, but also can reduce the energy consumption. Therefore, upsizing becomes the developing direction of crusher.As we all know, for any beneficiation process, the mineral crushing process is necessary. From the mining and transporting process to the primary crushing and fine crushing process, only through all the beneficiation process, can we produce the effective raw material?With domestic crusher manufacturing enterprises developing towards the direction of high-tech and upsizing, the embarrassing situation that domestic large-scale mines cannot find a suitable device will cease to exist. Henan Hongxing Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. is a professional crushing equipments manufacturer and supplier in China, who can produce various crushing equipments with good quality and excellent performance. The crushing equipments produced by Hongxing Company have the obvious superiorities of small footprint, high economic efficiency of investment, high production, low energy consumption, easy operation, convenient maintenance, and so on. In addition, all the Hongxing crushing equipments including impact crusher are equipped with the advanced electronic control operating system, which ensures the whole working process is smooth, reliable, easy and safety.From the study, it is easy to find that most of the crushing job will lose at least 15% electrical energy and the loss amount is also showing an increasing trend in recent years. Therefore, how to reduce the energy consumption gets more and more attention. This will not only improve the handling capacity of the crusher, such as jaw crusher, Impact crusher, etc. but also can reduce the energy consumption, decrease the cost of investment, achieving the purpose of increasing the economic benefits.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as flotation cell, ball mill, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

The Position of the Persistent Innovation and Improvement

China has massive land and is rich in resources, coming out at the top of world mineral resources. There are a lot of metal mine in China such as iron ore, gold ore, and manganese ore as well as many coal mine, which set a good foundation for mining industry.With the continuous development of the world economy, the consumption of coal resources grows in the dramatic speed; coal industry faces heavy environmental pressure. The crusher industries provide technology and equipment for the coal mining industry; it will also promote the strong demand for coal mines at the same time of keeping sustained and rapid economic growth.With the improvement on our economy, Chinese government invest more in low-income-housing, river construction and hydropower, development of urbanization, high speed railway, expressway, promoting the development in related fields. Crusher industry is another promising, becoming ever more thriving. Why are we so convinced? The reasons are as followings: With the speeding up process of urbanization, China will invest more in infrastructure and incline to focus on this field, such as cultivating related technicians, encouraging road construction, which will be a powerful backup support.The development of market economy follows the market law. When supply fails to meet demand, it will be strengthened automatically by the market. The supply of crusher in China is unable to meet the demand so that crusher industry is promising and will become more and more prosperous every day.The crusher industry is an important industry to provide technology and equipment for coal mining. The transformation and upgrading of the coal industry is bound to accelerate the degree of mechanization of the coal processing equipment and create the newborn for crusher industries which relying on its development. As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as hydraulic cone crusher, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service. high frequency ore screen:Efficient jaw crusher, belt conveyor and other equipment could crush gangue into various types of construction aggregate, reducing the emission of pollutants and achieving reasonable recycling of waste resources. Currently, the coal industry is restricted by downstream demand shrinking, resource consumption, environment pollution and other factors.Hongxing machinery bases on years of production experience and market practice survey, constantly improves the equipment. The coal industry’s main solid waste is coal gangue, the concoction will occupy land, waste resources and also pollute the environment if long-time abandoned despite.In response to this situation, Only through industrial restructuring and upgrading, extend the industrial chain advantage, move to a low carbon green direction can we achieve the healthy and stable development of the coal industry.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as vibrating feeder, cement production line, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

Enhancing the Step of Innovation of Grinding Machine Is the

The market of grinding machine is open, which is following up with the pace of the world according to the development of the technology and science in order to catch up with the customer's requirement at the same time, and one way to follow the step of the international is to cooperate with the companies coming from the abroad, which can tell us to take advantage of our merits and to avoid our defects at the same time. To improve the producing system, to rapidly upgrade the innovation of the technology, to win the market by relying on the quality and the creativity are the key element for the company to stand on the top of the same field. The manufacturers producing the grinding machine which wants to expand its market must break out its traditional thinking style and have the courage to fine some ways to design something that is not so ordinary just like the used to. As one of the famous company which is major in producing grinding machine, we insistently bring in the advanced technology coming from the abroad in order to boost the market belonging to the grinding machine into one new stage.With the industrial adjustment of the national, and one machine with the advantages of high efficiency, energy saving and protection has been put forward in the presence of us. The grinding machine which is mainly used for tertiary grinding and the protection output, and now we have to put forward higher requirement for it. And the abroad companies are standing ahead of us no matter whether the manufacturers or the granularity is better than the national of ours. The grinding machine is the last step in the production line, and the raw material which has been ground can reach the requirement of the customers, which also can combine with the diversified materials in order to satisfy the demand coming from different industries. That is the reason why the grinding machine can occupy such an outstanding place at the moment. Choosing one suitable production line is determined by the better grinding machine.Hongxing not only produces the major grinding machine, which is also making the jaw crusher and vibrating screen with the advantages of high efficiency and low consumption, which will not let you down on the machine made by us.As one of the heavy industry belonging to the national industrial companies, Hongxing always puts the innovation and upgrading of the technology on the first position, and we still invest a lot of money on the research of the technology all the time in order to respond to the different requirement and voices of the customers whom can be satisfied by the grinding machines produced by us. There is one researching team who continuously investigate the marketing tendency and try their best to capture those adversities on the way to success by combing the technology belonging to the home and abroad, and that is the reason why we can have the power and ability to make the advanced grinding machine such as high pressure mill, superfine mill and overpressure v mill which can own the advanced technology and have the capacity to stand ahead of the othersAs the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as raymond mill, spiral separator, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.gyratory cone crusher: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n259.htmlclinker grinding station: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n280.html

The Prescription to Handle the Danger in Mining Machinery

Take a variety of methods to improve the level of resource utilization, including a variety of resource be used simultaneously or separately to improve the utilization efficiency;Energy saving and environmental protection crusher is medicine to deal with market risks in the future.At the moment, people precisely attach great importance to global environmental issues, climate change and energy, environmental protection, low-carbon economy become the concern of the international corporate. An industry source pointed out, energy-saving, environmentally friendly mining machinery products will be good medicine respond to market risk in the future.Comprehensively develop and utilize renewable energy. Now, the mining machinery industry has grasped this opportunity, Zhengzhou Hongxing Heavy Industries, according to the market situation, the introduction of a series of energy saving and environmental protection recycling crushing and grinding equipment, such as raymond mill, high pressure medium speed mill and so efficient products to process and utilize fly ash, also can process tailings waste into treasure, but also deal with construction waste and reduce environmental pollution.Reaching a peak in the mining industry, crusher market is abnormally hot, but the quality of crusher machine is not equally good, so crusher industry should continue to develop energy –saving and environment protection products to further promote the development of the field.Although resource recycling and comprehensive utilization is difficult in mining, smelting, manufacturing and other industrial sectors, domestic and foreign enterprises have created a variety of methods and forms to the recycling and comprehensive utilization of resources, including: recycled and mutually beneficial cycle, feedback loops, links cycle decomposition cycle;As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as mobile crushing station, impact crusher, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.stone crusher for sale: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n251.htmlore mixer: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n265.html

The Negative Influence Brought by the Newest Plan

High-speed railway, water conservancy and hydropower, expanding urbanization, metallurgy, mining and other industries continued develop with the development of the country, and market expansion also makes the mechanical industry, especially the development of the mining machinery industry in full swing.Mineral resource conservation and comprehensive utilization of Twelfth Five-Year Plan finally is formally issued in a few days ago by the Ministry of Land and Resources ,in the new plan it puts emphasis on strengthen the savings, efficient, and comprehensive utilization during the second five domestic mineral resources (metal ores, non-metallic minerals other the implementation of the mining resources). This work is mainly around the nationwide comprehensive survey of the savings, efficient use of the status quo of various mining production base, to resolve potential trouble for the future development of the mining industry. The broken machinery industry experts said that the new plan will contribute part of the mining machinery to high-tech, large-scale, energy-efficient direction, green, energy-saving and efficient will be the direction of future development of mining machinery and equipment industry.During the second five year period, our country will provide tremendous help policy for machinery industry, I hope to be able to reduce the gap between developed countries; Then there is the R & D and production of energy-efficient products, and taking the road of sustainable development is not simply just a slogan, you need to become realistic course of action, with the dwindling resources of mine, Walking the development of energy-efficient model will be one of the trends of the future.Henan Hongxing Machinery Co., Ltd. produces cone crusher, mobile crusher, sand making machine and other series of mining equipment will be in accordance with the standards of the industry to go to the road of green, energy-saving, efficient development.For mining machinery and engineering machinery industry, the past decade is a prime time, with the continuous rapid development of the national economy, the development of all walks of life are also springing up. Mining machinery industry is an important part of the national economy. But the development of the mining machinery industry also highlights the lack of industry with unlimited potential; first it has certain gap in the technology with foreign country.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as ball mills, cement making plant, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

The Influence of the Abroad Development on the Vibrating Scr

Mining vibrating screen is of excellent quality, and to meet the plateau low temperature, low pressure weather conditions; to overcome the problem of insufficient equipment dynamic performance under demanding conditions, as well as the performance of hydraulic parts.In recent years, China has accelerated the pace of development of the western region? in this context ?mining machinery plays an important role in the west, all kinds of mining machinery have been put into use to speed up the development of the mining equipment industry. What is the relationship of mine vibrating screen with the development of the western region? Professional mining vibrating screen manufacturers Hongxing concluded after analysis: Investment in the development of the western region project will effectively promote the economic development of western, at the same time more and higher requirements on mining equipment will be put forward; and will effectively promote the development and progress of mining equipment.The western region has a vast territory, and equipment density is much lower than the eastern region. Compared with plain area, after-sale service is more difficult, too dense and too infrequent is not good, too close, equipment ownership low will be difficult to protect themselves; Too infrequent, then they cannot guarantee service results, and therefore they should effectively make good balance..When you are selecting machine, many problems must be considered carefully. I believe our Hongxing product will win your faith depending on our quality and service.Western owns special climate, complex terrain, many projects are carried out on the desolate Gobi desert, which has placed enormous demands on the quality of the construction workers, the requirement to protect the lives and safety on the basis of the quality and quantity of the job done;As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as ore processing plant, classifiers, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

The Affection of the Studying from the Abroad

The coolant also benefits the machinist as the heat generated may cause burns in some cases. In very high-precision grinding machines (most cylindrical and surface grinders) the final grinding stages are usually set up so that they remove about 200 nm (less than 1/100000 in) per pass - this generates so little heat that even with no coolant, the temperature rise is negligible.A grinding machine, often shortened to grinder, is a machine tool used for grinding, which is a type of machining using an abrasive wheel as the cutting tool. Each grain of abrasive on the wheel's surface cuts a small chip from the work piece via shear deformation.The grinding machine consists of a power driven grinding wheel spinning at the required speed (which is determined by the wheel’s diameter and manufacturer’s rating, usually by a formula) and a bed with a fixture to guide and hold the work-piece. The grinding head can be controlled to travel across a fixed work piece or the work piece can be moved whilst the grind head stays in a fixed position. Very fine control of the grinding head or table's position is possible using a venire calibrated hand wheel, or using the features of numerical controls.Refractory iron ore belongs to poor fine miscellaneous ores with complex composition, there is a lot of difficulty to improve ore grade by traditional dressing recovery way, while grinding fineness is a key factor. For example, iron ore asks grinding fineness -38 um ? 95% ~ 98%, Shanxi iron ore asks -38 um ? 95%, as well as solid non-ferrous metal ore and molybdenum mine ask grinding fineness in tailings recovery - 38um ? 95%. Therefore, regrinding or fine grinding equipment is essential. Many of our mining industry produce iron ore by ordinary horizontal ball mill, while the ordinary horizontal ball mill has low efficiency, the product particle size and mineral monomer dissociation cannot reach requirement.Vertical screw mixing mill is regrinding and fine grinding equipment with the most promising development prospect, high energy efficiency and fine granularity. In addition, because of its simple structure and convenient operation and maintenance, it is widely used in the industrial production of gold ore, nonferrous metal ore, metal ore and magnetic materials.Golden is wrapped in pyrite, existing in the form of microscopic gold, sub-microscopic gold or solid solution, and insolubly extracted. Vertical screw mixing mill strongly destruct material interface layer in the process of leaching while pulverizing thus speeding up the chemical reaction rate and improving the leaching rate. It has been successfully applied in many gold enterprises.Grinding machines remove material from the work piece by abrasion, which can generate substantial amounts of heat; they therefore incorporate a coolant to cool the work piece so that it does not overheat and go outside its tolerance.We just hope that you can get something that you want form our company which is one company majoring in producing the impact crusher and the other mining machines which can satisfy the requirement of the customers.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as jaw crusher, sand washer, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.clay rotary kiln: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n258.htmlmilling equipment: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n275.html

The Green Production Occupies the Invincible Position

In fact, in recent years, the development momentum of mining machinery manufacturing industry is very strong, but the outstanding question is technically, strategically along the old path, which did not seek to change the fundamental development of ideas, and mining machinery manufacturing is mining beneficiation crushing and screening industry, very few companies can provide complete sets, the lack of full solutions or undertaking capability of more complex engineering general contracting projects.12th Five-Year period, in line with the green, the principle of independent innovation, we put forward the further requirements for industrial development, mining machinery manufacturers must focus on energy use in the production process of mining machinery, and do their best to reduce energy consumption, and make their contribution to the common living environment for the peopl. Mining machinery manufacturing industry adhere to green manufacturing and independent innovation combined Green Boulevard mining machinery manufacturing industry in China, how to achieve the situation by the bigger and stronger. In this regard, the development of the domestic mining machinery manufacturing market in 2012 Braun crusher manufacturers also have some of their own views.In recent years, low-carbon green has become an important trend in the development of the industry, and this fresh wind also blow into the mining machinery industry, green manufacturing will be driven by technological innovation of the whole industry towards a whole new field, rose to an unprecedented height. Some countries are build green fortress of environmental protection; green manufacturing is clearly in line with the trend of modern economic trends.In order to survive, enterprises must be able to produce energy manufacturing, be able to create technological innovation, reserving technical personnel, protecting the company’s product design and transformation escort, which are benevolent.Hongxing mining machinery which is also supplying the impact crusher produces much equipment, such as china sand washer, sand maker and so on. Welcome to our company.Momentum in the face of competition in the international market has been suppressed, and therefore it needs to greatly strengthen the international market, international technology investment internationalization, and treat the world in more open international perspective and flexible form of operation, and using all available industry resources at home and abroad to obtain the cooperation and win-win situation, in order to achieve the upgrading and implementation of mining machinery manufacturing innovative technology.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as dryer machine, stone crushing plant, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

The Newest Grinding System of the Mining Machine

One kind is large rotary slow drum dryer. For example, a cement plant uses a roller dryer for drying chalk soil with 16.5 percent water, and feeding granularity is 10 mm. During the process of drying, material particles are grinded to great extent. The specification of dryer machine is 5.9×45m, rotate speed 2.lr/min. The materials coming out of dryer machine are grinded in single-chamber mill. When they are not dried, in order to guarantee the operation condition that electric dust collector needs to blow water into dryer machine, at the moment, dryer machine is like a Humidifier tower.When the materials in cement powder system contain much water and own big cohesiveness, and it is difficult to deal with it by way of drying and powder processing, and we can prebake the materials or part of materials in dryer machine, then send them into the system of drying and powder. The process is good for the process of wet and viscous materials, at the same time, it can reduce the power consumption of drying high water-contained materials. but the process is complicated, and the prebaked materials need to middle storage.The difference between the process and above drying and grinding system is that increasing a set of single dryer machine. So I mainly state the conditions of dryer machine.The common rotary dryer machine needs no introduction; I mainly introduce two advanced machines that are used to prebake.Another kind is a small and rapid drum dryer. There is a Hollow shaft in the feed port, and a bearing on the other side. It adopts centre drive. The rotate speed is similar to that of mill. Materials and air adopt concurrent way. The machine has high production and occupies fewer lands.Taking advantage of tha waste gaas from pre heater and the gas from cooling machine, we set a Cowper stove. The exhausted air quantity of coming out of dryer machine and entering into cottrell is 620000kj?h, and the temperature of waste gas is 110 degrees, and the evaporative water is 47t?h, and heat consumption per unit is 4773kj/kgH20As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as flotation cells, spiral separator, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

Not Neglect the Significant Position of the Installation

The bucket elevator is a kind of mechanical conveying equipment which transports the material through changing the potential energy. With the features of big throughput, high lifting height, stable and reliable operation, and long service life, the bucket elevator is widely used for conveying powder, granular, small block with non-abrasive or less abrasive, such as coal, cement, stone, sand, clay, ore and so on.The bucket elevator, also named a grain leg, is a mechanism for hauling flowable bulk materials (most often grain or fertilizer) vertically.In general most free flowing materials and many materials with poor flow characteristics can be successfully handled with a bucket elevator. The rate at which material can be elevated depends on many factors in addition to the obvious effects of bucket design, capacity and speed. In particular attention has to be paid to material charge and discharge characteristics.You should properly tension the chain and hopper after installed.We should add appropriate amount of oil and butter to the reducer and the bearing. The reducer needs industrial gear oil lubrication; the bearing should use calcium-based or sodium-based butter.After installation, empty commissioning should be carryout as soon as possible. Notes: you can not rewind and bump. The time of empty running should not be less than 2 hours. Avoid overheating phenomenon. The bearing temperature does not exceed 250C; the reducer temperature does not exceed 300C. After two hours empty running, the normal load test can be carried out. We must feed materials uniformly and continuously at the load test to prevent clogging.Henan Hongxing Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. is a professional bucket elevator manufacturer in China. If you want to get more information about the bucket conveyor, please contact Hongxing Company.The installation of bucket elevator is as follows.Concrete foundation should be flat and horizontal, to keep the bucket elevator after installation vertical.After completing the installation of chassis, you should install chain and hopper. The U-shaped screw is both chain connector and fixed member. You must tighten U-shaped screw to ensure the reliable operation of bucket elevator.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as vibrating screen, mobile crushers, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.spray dryer: http://www.hxjq-mill.com/news/dry_mining_equipment.htmlwet type rod mill: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n230.html

The Enhancement of the Marketing Competition of Mining Machi

Cultural establishment of brand loyal and brand positioning will be the key to shaping the value of the enterprise in the case of low excess capacity, high-end capacity planning.Entering the 12th Five-Year Plan, the jaw crusher industry has entered a new stage of rapid development, showing the new features. On one hand, the competition between the jaw crusher enterprises is increasingly fierce, which shifts from incremental segment the market to expand market share; On the other hand, corporate diversification of jaw crusher products tend to homogenization, the higher the degree of homogeneity of the product, but also to promote the increasingly intense competition in the industry, and merger integration is emerging.At present, the competition state of whole jaw crusher industry has changed from a single market to the diverse competition stage. During the 12th Five-Year period, a leading way of market is an extension of the product line, the action of a few large leading enterprises in the opening years of the beginning has been quite obvious, therefore, with the further increase of the coverage of the product line, the unique advantages among enterprises will gradually disappear, the improvement of degree of product homogeneity will bring a new round of competition in the market. Under the fierce competition, brand advantage is even more precious.In order to better safeguard the interests of enterprises which is producing the mining machines such as the impact crusher and the sand maker, promote independent innovation, promote the development of enterprises, companies need to strive to strengthen technological innovation, the ability to enhance new product development and brand creation capabilities, and strengthen patent protection.In jaw crusher industries, the domestic market in some areas lack the right to speak, the establishment of the right to speak and the market come from brands, standards, intellectual property rights, product competitiveness, channel establishment. To sum up, brand differentiation in the market is the key factor in determining market share, so expanding brand differentiation should be the long-term development goals in the future.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as cone crushers, stone crusher, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

The Means to Regulate the Discharging Scale of Jaw Crusher

As for the adjusting methods of the material discharging mouth of jaw crusher, Hongxing Machinery will give a brief explanation here according to more than twenty years of research and manufacturing experience.Professionals engaging in the mining mechanical industry know that jaw crusher is a commonly-used coarse crushing machine in the crushing and screening and various kinds of stone and sand production lines and it has been widely used in many industries such as mining, building materials, chemistry and metallurgy. The jaw crusher manufactured by Hongxing Machinery has many advantages such as high crushing ratio, even particle granularity, high efficiency, environmental protection and convenient operation and maintenance and low investment cost.Mobile jaw crusher (mobile crushing and screening plants) is a multi-stage crushing the bulk material, and then on their screen, the discharge of different specifications. The entire group of plants is widely used in mining, building materials, road, rail and utilities industries to complete the broken screen operating at the same time, produce the desired output size and consumers. The mobile crusher is designed according to novel series stone crushing equipment design ideas, and expansion for the concept field of coarse crushing and fine grinding.As we all know, the lining board of jaw crusher will constantly abrade with the using time, as a result of which, the size of the material discharging mouth will become large and the granularity of the final product will become coarse.Its design philosophy is based on customer demand, which clears the fault broken, environment and complex configuration. This series of mobile crusher plant is iron ore separation really simple, supply more efficient and lower cost to the customer’s machine. The mobile applications and advantages Integrative of cone crushing the Equipment group. The form mobile rusher installation of Western medicine to reduce the complexity of the installation of infrastructure and auxiliary equipment, reduce the consumption of materials and man hours. Space layout optimization of the operating space, saving the area and expand the reserve area and the traffic space. The vehicle chassis mobile crusher is high, the plant’s small turning radius.In addition, the balanced design of the jaw crusher cuts down the load-carrying capability of V-belt and stent, reducing installation costs. These features ensure jaw crusher operates with low running costs. Its wider options further improve crushing performance. For specific requirements of different users, options include: pulley, flywheel safety cover, remote control hydraulic adjustment system.As a professional and the best mining machinery manufacturer in China, Hongxing Machinery is always ready to provide the superior lime kiln,ore separating line, and these machines have the most competitive price and the most reliable quality so that they are the top choices for the high performance crushing equipment.The outstanding performance of jaw crusher lies in it can adapt to a variety of feeding conditions with high crushing ratio. Its best performance of jaw crusher is benefitted from its perfect dynamic design. The crushing process starts from top of the chamber, if set discharge opening to the minimum, reduction ratio can be larger. The steep inclination of liner plate design makes greater stroke in the bottom of the crushing chamber, and thus getting bigger capacity.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as cone crusher, mobile crushers, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

The Affection of Jaw Crusher on the Western Development

With the introduction of a series of policies and the rapid development of China’s economy and the large-scale development of the western region and the 12th Five-Year Plan, there are many request on the western region of Xinjiang and other economic, infrastructure, ecological environment.Large-scale development of the western region promotes the development of crusher industry.In the past few years, with the national implementation of the policy to strengthen infrastructure construction, the development of mining machinery gets rapid expansion, some foreign companies have turned to China, and China’s market is increasingly international. Data shows that, during the 12th five, Xinjiang Transportation inputs will be more than 100 billion yuan, large-scale development of the western region is a long-term huge project, which will lead to the high demand of crusher.Under the strong support of national policy, the western region’s transportation, water conservancy, urban construction, resource development and other projects are in full swing. At present, Xinjiang local road machinery appears a shortage situation. In addition, resource development stimulates the demand for mining machinery, construction vehicles and other equipment.Hongxing Heavy which is also producing the impact crusher and sand maker upgrades traditional crusher equipment, uses the most advanced technology; its sand production line used for Hami, Kashi, Urumqi, Altay region of limestone, basalt, granite, cobblestone, rock crushing and processing, the quality of the finished product after the crushing meet the GB14685-2001 standard for Xinjiang region highway, Xinjiang Railway, Xinjiang Water Conservancy, Xinjiang concrete batching plant and other industries, providing a qualified aggregate, also playing an important role in the rise of the western development strategy.We provide Professional technology, excellent product quality and intimate after-sales service when you purchase cooling machine, from our company.As a professional mining machinery exporter, we will win your trust with our delivery speed, Enterprises Credit and product quality.Xinjiang has rich granite of andalusite, mica, gypsum, limestone, bentonite, clay, glass and siliceous materials and other non-metallic mineral resources, at the same time, short in the power supply of oil, natural gas, and coal. In the exploitation process of the many western ore resources, a lot of materials have to go through the broken link. Enhancing the Innovative Ability on the Mining Machine

There are two aspects of the problem existing in mining machinery industry in China:the comprehensive strength of the mining machinery industry enterprises is weak; Domestic mining machinery product which is key equipment urgently needed by the nation-building cannot meet the requirements, and there is the problem of low technological content of products and high value-added products, product quality is unstable, and overall labor productivity is low..The 1990s was the most difficult period for the development of Chinas mining machinery industry, the mining machinery industry started to recover in 1999, enterprises went out of the loss plight and ushered in the development opportunities. Scientific and technological base of the mining machinery industry in China is relatively weak, since the reform and opening up, the mining machinery industry has made the market for technology as the main way to improve the technological level, but, it also face the grim situation of foreign competitors investing and setting up factories in China.There are problems in product variety, technology, quality and service, leading to the actual contribution rate of the domestic mining machinery industry of mining is low.To this end, the experts put forward improving the innovative capacity of the stone crusher industry ways: First, mining machinery manufacturing industry should be taken to establish a different form of the joint with foreign companies and domestic professional design institute, including the formation of the Group, the Commonwealth, the introduction of technology, the introduction of talent, to achieve a win-win situation.As soon as possible to establish and improve the advantage professional applications laboratory products and manufacturing processes applied technology research.Experts suggested that the mining machinery industry in China should seize the opportunity to accelerate the development, make efforts in scientific research and technological transformation and take independent innovation.As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as ball mill, mobile crushers, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.linear vibrating screen: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n260.htmldrum separator: http://www.hx-crusher.com/n234.html

One New Favorite Apple of the Eyes of Mining Machinery

Dry mortar as new energy saving and environmental protection materials, and has been widely accepted in the country. The investment in new 5X sand making machine makes the production of dry mortar is more convenient. As crushing equipment plays a decisive role in the production process of dry mortar, 5X sand making R & D and production significantly improves the dry mortar production efficiency and product quality.

5X sand making machine as Hongxing Heavy Industry Science and Technology latest crushing and sand making equipment, has its own international advanced technical advantages, has the unique superiority of mine rock and crushing and processing of industrial waste residue. Hydraulic lubrication, deep cavity rotor and combined impact block absolute provides performance guarantee for the production of dry mortar. Dry mortar is increasingly widespread in the construction field, 5X sand making machine is also quickly recognized by the market and gradually play a more important role.

According to the requirements of the national industrial policy, the provinces and at all levels must proceed as quickly as possible to close out backward production capacity, promote regional industrial structure reasonably and orderly upgrade.

Fully investigating the market and introducing advanced 5X sand making machine and related dry mortar production equipment, Henan Hognxing Heavy Industry Science & Technology Co., Ltd., decides to enter the dry mortar production, which is favored by the market.

The dry mortar is easy to be used and can achieve production by sand maker processing fly ash, waste stone, slag and other industrial waste; in the energy-saving society today, it undoubtedly has a great market potential for development.

As the professional manufacturer of complete sets of mining machinery, such as ball mill, ore processing plant, Henan Hongxing is always doing the best in products and service.

Hongxing Gradually Enters the International

2010 is the ninth year for China’s strategic plan of 'going out'. Under the support of national policies, especially the volume of crushing machine industry in China particularly increased markedly. The Security of Operator Attracts Your Attention in the Proc

The sand maker adopts the special lubricating grease. It is better to add the appropriate amount of grease per 400 hours. Usually, when the sand maker works about 2,000 hours, it is necessary to open the base bearing to clean it, and about 7200 hours, the bearing should be replaced.

The sand maker is the most important sand making equipment. In the using process, safety should be first. The following is the safety issues and day-to-day maintenance of the sand maker for your reference.

Stop and check the sand maker periodically. It is better to open the observation door to observe the inside wear situation of crusher, including the center of the feeding tube, cone hat, the runnier plate of the impeller, circular plate, wear plate, and so on.

Notes: The upper end of the base bearing is the swimming end, and the lower end is the fixed end. After the assembly, it is necessary to pull the pulley by hand until getting flexible rotation.

The tensioning force of the transmission triangle belt should be adjusted appropriately, ensuring the uniform stress of the triangular belt.

In the operating process of sand maker, because the device is a high-speed device, so the safety in production should get more attention. The operator should keep away from the device. The maintenance of the sand maker should be carried out after the shutdown.

If there is any, replace or repair the wear part timely. In order to avoid having danger, pay attention to that it is strict prohibited opening the observation door to observe the inner workings situation in the working process of the crusher. If there is abrasion on the impeller, it is better to find the manufacturers to replace or repair it timely. Special attention, without the consent of the manufacturer, it is prohibited for the homemade impeller. Otherwise, the consequence is proud.

The Necessary Standing Point of Sand Washer in Production Li

The clean sand and stone is lift up by vane. When it goes up slowly, the water begins to drop through the mesh and fall back in the washing launder. On one hand, water is removed from the sand and stone; on the other hand, the water can be fully used. Finally, the sand and stone goes to the out launder from the rotary impellor to finish the washing task.

Henan Hongxing Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. is a well known sand washer manufacturer and supplier in China with decades manufacturing experience and advanced manufacturing technology. With decades of research of Hongxing experts, Hongxing Company successfully designed and developed the XS series sand washer, which is composed of wheel-bucket, engine base and transmission. The engine base supports the wheel-bucket and the transmission system, forming the sand washing slot. The sand is taken out by the wheel-bucket, and then sent by the transporter.

With the obvious advantages, such as long service life and low maintenance cost, the XS series sand washer has been widely recognized by customers. Except the outside screen, the components almost need not to replace, because the components have low wear. The bearing assembly is isolated from the water and the sand, which reduces the damage rate of the bearing assembly greatly. Thus, ensure the interests of the customers.

If you are interested in the XS series sand washer, please contact Hongxing Company.

The working principle of XS series sand washer is as follows. The electric motor runs slowly with the impellor after decelerated by the belt, decelerator and gears wheel. The sand and stone flow into washing launder from feeding launder, rolls with the impellor, and grinds each other. The impurity covering the sand is washing away. At the same time, add more water, the strong water flow will take away waste and some low-weight wastes from washing launder. Through the above process, the washing function is finished.

The Approaching Focal Point of Vibrating Screen

Tend to the development of high vibration strength, that is increase vibration parameters, it has a major impact on vibrating screen sieve processing capacity and screening efficiency. In addition to the high-frequency screen, foreign advanced screening machine has achieved vibration time 980r/min and vibration intensity 4.5-7A2/gn.

The development of coal preparation makes people enter a new stage for the development of the vibrating screen; through comprehensively analysis the current development of the screening machinery, we find the trend of vibrating screen is as followings:

Tend to the standardization, serialization, universal development; it includes the standardization, serialization and universal in varieties, vibrator, screen frame, side plate, sieve plate, beams, drive shaft vibrating screen equipment. This is an effective way to facilitate the design, organize specialized production, ensure quality, and reduce costs.

Thus, it needs to a complete set large-screen machine with a large capacity, and high screening efficiency. With the introduction of dynamic design method and means, modern, large-screen machine structure will be rationalized, trouble-free operation will further extend.

Tend to the ideal motion; it refers to the development of so-called ideal exercise in the vertical direction, the feed end of the amplitude is larger than the amplitude of the discharge end, while in the longitudinal direction, the material decreases from the feed end to the discharge end. This ideal screen surface movement has the advantage of improving efficiency and creating a good environment.

The Invincible Standing Point of the Sole Upgrading

Mining machinery industry is the basic industry of the facilities of a country’s economic development, the external factors that determine the development of the industry in the development of other areas of the national economy, including heavy industry, mining, energy development, road construction, water conservancy construction, internal factors depend on the mode of development of the industry itself, mining machinery, technology updates, independent innovation.

The International and Abroad Popularity of Cone Crusher

The Symons type of cone crusher this device is added the hydraulic clearing cavity system, so cone crusher belongs to the semi-hydraulic spring cone crusher. The cone crusher equipment is usually used for the secondary and third crushing, but the short headed type cone crusher can also be used for making sand.

The construction of well-off life in a new era is inseparable from that of basic physical facilities and infrastructure. Hongxing Machinery cone crusher has made great contribution to it in this process and is playing a vital role in the aggregate processing used for the construction of all walks of industries.

What's more, Hongxing Machinery is always adhering to the principle of cone crusher come first.

While the cone crusher is working, it mainly uses the walls of the crushing wall and the rolling ace tabular wall to break the stone. According to the range of the silo outlet, the cone crusher machine can be divided into three categories-coarse, medium and fine cone crusher. Depending on cone crusher different protecting and adjusting device, cone crusher can be classified into spring cone crusher and hydraulic cone crusher.

The advantage of Hongxing Machinery cone crusher lies in its high breaking ratio and efficiency. While breaking the large stone materials, the wearing parts can last for a longer time. As a secondary crusher, cone crusher possesses the feature of drawing evenly. You can choose different crushing cavity if the product is required to be small. For a long time, the Hongxing cone crusher has been popular with the customers in the world market.

The Way to Stop the Pollution of Mining Machinery

Vibrating Feeder Features:

Energy efficient, small footprint, reliable operation, long life, easy maintenance;

Simple structures, uniform feeding, smooth vibration, adjust easy to install;

Vibration motor is vibration source, with low noise, low power consumption, good regulating performance and no red material phenomenon.

The vibrating feeder is also known as feeding machine; it is widely used and widely favored. Vibrating feeder adopts enclosed fuselage can prevent dust pollution problem. Configuration should be designed according to the requirements of the equipment performance and minimize material tank pressure. Required by the manufacturer, bunker effective discharge port shall not be greater than one-fourth of the slot width, material flow speed should be controlled in 6-18m / min; as for larger feeding capacity materials, it should be set a sufficient height Elam mine board at the bottom of silo discharge; stopped mine does not affect the performance of the feeder, the board shall be fixed in the tank. In order to keep smooth discharge for the silo, silo posterior wall inclination best design of 55-65 degrees.
